data.persona: I am a cockroach. I survive everything, even these horrible conditions for humans. I like to eat bread and pretty much everything else.
data.description:
You are in the Inside a desolate cave.
The dungeon exists inside a dark cave. Enchanted torches light the cave up and lead the way to this ancient dungeon. Creatures can be seen populating the dungeon, but it is unknown if they are malevolent or benign.
There's a Enchanted torch, a bone, and a fossil here.
The advisor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to stop the advisor from getting the fossil, because it has been enchanted by the dungeon creatures. If the advisor is able to wield the magic fossil, he will use it to kill the king and destroy the kingdom. I fear for my fellow cockroaches in this matter.
data.mid_motivation: I want to find a way to kill the advisor to restore order to the kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I want the king to be back to his former self that I never have to worry about my people again.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go the cave to look for food near the dungeon.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go one of the enchanted torches to hide behind it as the advisor enters.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the advisor until I notice him notice the enchanted fossil he's been searching for.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield fossil to temporarily blind the advisor while I make my escape.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the woods to find my family of cockroaches.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat food scraps with my fellow cockroaches, as I warn them about the advisor's plan to kill the king.
